content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am glad to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Considering the prime location and the high standard of this newly built apartment, my initial budget is relatively tight. I would like to propose starting the negotiations at a significantly lower price than the market rate, say around 450 Euros per month.

If you disagree with this proposal but are open to further negotiation, please provide a counteroffer while keeping in mind my financial constraints. If this price meets your expectations, I'll happily agree to it. Otherwise, I don't want to continue the negotiation, as my budget leaves little room for adjustments.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for the apartment's quality and prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
